dmca.title: FW: [ThePlanetAbuse-C2740349R] PF - trpery.com
dmca.body:
THEPLANET standard reply.

THEPLANET does not even enforce their own AUP.
http://www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/Planet%20Acceptable%20Usage%20Policy%20AUP%20011507%20FINAL.pdf
